About MODE Editorial criteria Catalogue Links

We are pleased to announce the launch of our new website! The website includes information pages about our project and a front-end to our edition. Both the information pages and the edition front-end are fully optimized for desktop and mobile devices.

The website includes a news section where we will be able to keep you up-to-date with our latest achievements. On the edition front-end side, all madrigals that we have edited up to now are available and can be browsed.

We hope you find the new website easy to use and informative. Please send us your feedback: info@marenzio.org
